Level 58, stage in capturing Mocchi
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 58, stage in capturing Mocchi
By Y.K. TAN on Tuesday, June 1, 2004 - 09:30 pm:

Stage 58

This stage depends on how you recgonise the pattern of the octopee's movements. The red wing in which now you can catch mocchi is visible, so grab it before you exit the stage. All in all, you can choose to start this stage either on the right or on the left. Box your way up, remember to keep and stand yourself in the middle of the map later and destroy boxes and make gaps so that the octopee's can't reach you. Grab key from the right and exit from the left, easy enough?
